dict.string: Why should you start an online store right now?
Because I can earn a lot of money in two weeks!
Because I hate my current job
Because it's not harder than to open a can of cola
Oh, it's an image instead a question text!
I think it should be a picture not an image...
No, it's a painting, I'm sure!
Ok, guys. It's a visual representation of information.
Yes, it's a nice HTML page!
No, this is just a text box
Oh, I don't know what is it
